short_summary: Letter of Interest for development of enabling space technologies
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Enabling Space Technologies

**Title**: Enabling Technologies for Future Missions

**Reference Number**: WS3580446531-Doc3580501377

**Amendment Number**: 1

## Tender Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency, is issuing a notification regarding the government's intention to proceed with one or more potential Requests for Proposal (RFPs) as part of the CSA's space technologies development program (STDP). 

**Synopsis**: The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) intends to develop enabling technologies related to potential opportunities for Canadian participation in national or international space missions of interest to Canada.

## Tender Notice

Tender notices, as outlined below, may be published on SAP Ariba: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13871143](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13871143)

*   Deadline for submissions is September 15, 2022, by 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
*   Interested parties must consult the tender notice to obtain additional information

## Tender Contact Information

*   Name: Anca Jurca (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [anca.jurca@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anca.jurca@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Telephone: Not specified
*   Fax: Not specified
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Contracting Entity**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**End User Entity:**

*   Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
*   6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada

**Delivery Region:**

*   Canada

Response Deadline: September 15, 2022, by 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)***
